channel.title: [PI] How can i make attack double?

item.title: [PI] How can i make attack double?
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

Hey, for example I have a Nex like monster but for the last stage I want him to hit twice for every game tick. Does anyone know any code for this? :S

Code so far:
case 1:
if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Fill My Soul With Smoke!”);
c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
c.gfx0(391);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.sendMessage(“The man fills your lungs with a deathly smoke.”);
}
if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Embrace Darkness!”);
c.gfx0(382);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
c.sendMessage(“You’re encased in a unholy shadow.”);
}
if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) {
npcs[i].HP += 185;
npcs[i].attackType = 2;
c.gfx0(377);
c.sendMessage(“The man Saps your health and increases his own.”);
}
if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) {
npcs[i].forceAnim(19);//turm
npcs[i].forceChat(“There is…NO ESCAPE!”);
npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2;
}
npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs[i].attackType = 0;
if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) {
npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs[i].forceChat(“AT LAST!!!”);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
}
break;

Also if anyone knows how to make a monster activate the turmoil curse would be helpful

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How can i make attack double?
